premise: A man standing in a narrow alley posing for a picture.
explanation_1: A narrow alley is located outside.

premise: A woman in a gray top gestures next to a woman with a knit had holding a wineglass.
hypothesis: The two women are in the same area as each other
explanation_1: If there is a woman and another woman, that is two women. If they are next to each other, they are in the same area as each other.

premise: A group of men watching as another man rides a bull in a rodeo.
hypothesis: A group of men watch another man ride a bull.
explanation_1: the man ride the bull and it is watched by other group of men

premise: A man in formal wear is posing in front of a building.
explanation_1: not every man is a farmer.

premise: Two young women posing for the camera.
hypothesis: The two women were showing their friends where they were at
explanation_1: Women do not have to be young.  Just because two young women posing for the camera it does not mean they were showing friends where they were at.

premise: Three boys are running on the beach playing a game.
hypothesis: The children are running away from a dog.
explanation_1: The fact boys are running on the beach does not necessarily mean they are running away from a dog.

premise: A man in a blue jacket with a helmet on skiing.
hypothesis: A man skiing on a difficult course.
explanation_1: The man may not be skiing a difficult course because he is wearing a helmet.

premise: A young girl on an orange slide
explanation_1: A young girl on a orange slide doesn't mean that she's playing with the boy.

premise: Three women are inside a bar are all holding drinks in their hands.
hypothesis: there is a group of people outside at a restaurant eating dinner and waving their napkins in the air
explanation_1: A bar and a restaurant are different places. Holding drinks and waving napkins are separate activities.

premise: A large man, in a jacket and hat, is holding something up to his ear.
explanation_1: A man in holding something up to his ear. He is not killing someone.

premise: A woman is standing on a mountain, surrounded by snow.
hypothesis: A dog chases after a group of birds.
explanation_1: It is either a woman or a dog. They are either standing on a mountain, or chasing after a group of birds.
